title: BMW 3 Series (E46)
summary: The BMW E46 is the fourth generation of the BMW 3 Series range of compact executive cars, which was produced by the German automaker BMW from 1997 to 2006, and was the successor to the E36, which ceased production in 2000. First introduced in November 1997, the E46 was available in sedan, coup√©, convertible, station wagon and hatchback body styles. The latter has been marketed as the 3 Series Compact.
